name: part_003
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka and Shirakami Fubuki perform 'CIRCUS PANIC!!!'.
Shirakami Fubuki narrates a storybook-style interlude about a princess from the Kingdom of Flowers.
Sakura Miko and Shirakami Fubuki perform 'HAPPY END PRINCESS'.

subtitles.original: さて、今日も始めましょうか...
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we begin today as well...

subtitles.original: あ〜、またやっちゃった〜！
subtitles.english: Ah~, I did it again!

subtitles.original: 実際はご覧の通り　まだまだ未熟な見習いなんです
subtitles.english:
In reality, as you can see,
I'm still just a clumsy apprentice.

subtitles.original: 先人に憧れ持って　私も！と飛び込んだものの
subtitles.english:
Looking up to my predecessors,
I dived in thinking, "Me too!"

subtitles.original: 現実はそんな簡単に　上手くいかないなあ…
subtitles.english:
But reality isn't that easy,
it's just not going well...

subtitles.original: もう一回！　怪奇模した喜劇が幕開け　一目見ればたちまち虜に！？
subtitles.english:
One more time!
The curtain rises on a comedy mimicking the strange.
One look and you're instantly captivated!?

subtitles.original: え？既にそれさっき見た？なら、飽き性なあなたにも朗報
subtitles.english:
Eh? You've already seen that?
Then here's good news for you, who gets bored easily.

subtitles.original: Q.ちょっと前の模倣をするだけ
subtitles.english: Q. Just mimicking what came before?

subtitles.original: A.繰り返しじゃつまらない！
subtitles.english: A. Repetition is boring!

subtitles.original: だから、ここから先は趣向を変えてみよう！
subtitles.english: So, let's try changing the presentation from here on!

subtitles.original: ドタバタなサーカスの行方は　誰にも自分すらも分からない！？
subtitles.english:
The outcome of this slapstick circus...
No one knows, not even me!?

subtitles.original: 私を選んだ君だけでも楽しんでってよ〜〜〜！！！損させないから
subtitles.english:
Since you chose me, please enjoy yourself to the fullest!!!
I'll make it worth your while!

subtitles.original: いつの日か皆と楽しめる　ショーがしたいんだよな〜！
subtitles.english:
I want to put on a show
that everyone can enjoy one day!

subtitles.original: だからこそ、こんなとこで　挫けるわけとかかな〜い！
subtitles.english: That's why I can't afford to give up in a place like this!

subtitles.original: 言葉なんかじゃ言い表せない　あの感動を私もいつか…
subtitles.english:
That emotion that can't be put into words...
I hope to one day...

subtitles.original: とても偉大なこのステージに　見合っているか分かんないけれど
subtitles.english:
I don't know if I'm worthy
of this grand stage yet, but...

subtitles.original: 観客全て、私の色で　染め尽くしてやろう！
subtitles.english: I'll dye every member of the audience in my own colors!

subtitles.original: 手始めに、今、眼の前の君たちからいくよ〜〜〜！！！
subtitles.english: To start with, I'm coming for all of you right in front of me!!!

subtitles.original: 創造しよう
subtitles.english: Let's create it!

subtitles.original: 華々しいスポットライトの中
subtitles.english: Amidst the brilliant spotlights,

subtitles.original: 目を奪うような妙技の数々
subtitles.english: numerous eye-catching feats.

subtitles.original: この瞬間が世界で一番　“娯楽”の名に相応しいんだ！
subtitles.english:
This moment is the most worthy in the world
of the name "entertainment"!

subtitles.original: 割れんばかりの歓声と拍手で
subtitles.english: With thunderous cheers and applause,

subtitles.original: ショーが終わっていく
subtitles.english: the show comes to an end.

subtitles.original: ああ…これが私が望んだ夢のエンディング。
subtitles.english: Ah... this is the dream ending I wished for.

subtitles.original: これは花の国のお姫様がこの王国へいらっしゃった時のお話
subtitles.english:
This is a story from when a princess from the Kingdom of Flowers
came to visit this kingdom.

subtitles.original: まだみんな彼女の事を知らない頃だったので　国民の大半は、アホの子なんて言ってたけど、
subtitles.english:
Back then, before everyone knew who she was,
most of the citizens called her a bit of an airhead.

subtitles.original: とっても心優しくて気さくで頼りになるお姫様だったんだよ
subtitles.english:
But she was a very kind, friendly,
and reliable princess.

subtitles.original: なんてったって、みこはお姫様なんだから！
subtitles.english: Because after all, Miko is a princess!

subtitles.original: 女神！ 聖女！ 叡智！ 聡明！ 慈愛！ 博愛！
subtitles.english: Goddess! Saint! Wisdom! Brilliance! Affection! Philanthropy!

subtitles.original: ですわ！　あたしなんてったってお姫様
subtitles.english: Desu-wa! After all, I'm a princess.

subtitles.original: ハッピーエンドプリンセス
subtitles.english: HAPPY END PRINCESS

subtitles.original: この人生におけるヒロイン
subtitles.english: The heroine of this life.

subtitles.original: ですわー！
subtitles.english: Desu-waaa!

subtitles.original: 一生姫プでイージーモード！って思ったら勝手にご存です！？
subtitles.english:
Easy mode with 'princess play' for life!
Who said you could decide that!?

subtitles.original: 世間はいっつも風向き次第
subtitles.english: The world always goes where the wind blows.

subtitles.original: 有象無象ばかりでホント　人間不信になっちゃう
subtitles.english:
Full of nobodies, honestly,
it makes me lose faith in humanity.

subtitles.original: 気づいたのこの世界に　血も涙もないこと
subtitles.english:
I realized that this world
has neither blood nor tears.

subtitles.original: あれもダメ
subtitles.english: Not that,

subtitles.original: これもダメ
subtitles.english: not this,

subtitles.original: それもダメ
subtitles.english: not that either,

subtitles.original: どれもダメ
subtitles.english: none of it works.

subtitles.original: 現実は世知辛い
subtitles.english: Reality is just bitter.

subtitles.original: 全部改変ですわ…！
subtitles.english: It's time for a total modification...!

subtitles.original: あたしなんてったってお姫様
subtitles.english: After all, I'm a princess.

subtitles.original: この人生におけるヒロイン
subtitles.english: The heroine of this life.

subtitles.original: 悲しいシナリオを
subtitles.english: A sad scenario—

subtitles.original: 全部全部書き換えちゃうの
subtitles.english: I'll rewrite every single bit of it.

subtitles.original: だってだってお姫様
subtitles.english: Because, because I'm a princess.

subtitles.original: 自分の物語くらいは
subtitles.english: My own story, at least,

subtitles.original: キッラキラ楽しまなきゃ　ですわ！ですわ！ですわ！
subtitles.english:
I have to enjoy it with some sparkle!
Desu-wa! Desu-wa! Desu-wa!

subtitles.original: 今にみてなさい！運命なんて
subtitles.english: Just you watch! Fate and all that...

subtitles.original: 改変して差し上げますわ！
subtitles.english: I'll modify it all for you!

subtitles.original: だれ？だれ？だれ？だれ？　裏で糸を引いてるのはだれ？
subtitles.english:
Who? Who? Who? Who?
Who's the one pulling the strings behind the scenes?

subtitles.original: 操り人形だなんて　ごめんだわ全く
subtitles.english:
Being a puppet...
I'm absolutely not interested.

subtitles.original: 上品な顔してても　黒幕はあの人かも
subtitles.english:
Even with an elegant face,
they might be the mastermind.

subtitles.original: まずはあたしが　強くならなきゃ
subtitles.english: First, I have to become strong.

subtitles.original: 未来は変わらない
subtitles.english: Otherwise, the future won't change.

subtitles.original: 改革だ…　自分改革ですわ…！
subtitles.english:
It's a reformation...
A self-reformation, desu-wa...!

subtitles.original: そうよなんてったってお姫様
subtitles.english: That's right, after all, I'm a princess.

subtitles.original: あたしこそ最高権力者
subtitles.english: I am the supreme ruler.

subtitles.original: 生涯すべての
subtitles.english: For my whole life,

subtitles.original: 主導権はこちらにあるわ
subtitles.english: I'll be the one in control.

subtitles.original: だってだってお姫様
subtitles.english: Because, because I'm a princess.

subtitles.original: 自分で決めたことくらいは
subtitles.english: Things I've decided for myself, at least...
